CustomField.formula: NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(TransportationMode__c)) || ISBLANK(LoadingDate__c) || ISBLANK(OrderDetail_Cnt__c) ) && ISPICKVAL(TransportationMode__c, "Route") && NOW() > DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(LoadingDate__c) & " 4:00:00") /* 4:00:00Z のGMT = 13時JST */ && ( ISBLANK(PickingedQuantity_Sum__c) || OrderDetailQuantity_Sum__c <> PickingedQuantity_Sum__c )
CustomField.label: 路線便ピッキングリスト遅延フラグ
